content: Abhir Bhalerao Skip to main content Skip to navigation Title: Emeritus Professor About: My research interests have been in image processing, medical image analysis and computer vision. Most recently, we have been investigating the use of cross-modal learning (from image and text) to automatically generate medical reports from radiology images. You can find more information on my work by browsing my publications/preprints.
